attributes.action: ALL Political Parties enact a 3 line whip on a vote on invoking Article 50.
attributes.background: IF the government fails in it's appeal against the high court on their decision on who can invoke Article 50, then the Conservatives, Labour and others must all place a three-line whip on a yes vote (yes to invoke it)

rejection.details: Arrangements for "whipping" votes are the responsibility of the political parties, not the Government and Parliament.
